title: Unlock the Ancient Tome
content:
Unlock the Ancient Tome Type Quest Act Act 1 Location Nautiloid Crash Reward __reward__

Unlock the Ancient Tome

Unlock the Ancient Tome is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Unlock the Ancient Tome can be acquired during Act 1 and is a part of the Search the Cellar. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Unlock the Ancient Tome Objectives

Unlock the book.

Unlock the Ancie
